laboratory_examinations.findings: 1.4 mg/dL (baseline before admission), 3.5 mg/dL (2 months earlier), 3.3 mg/dL (on admission), 3.0 mg/dL (second hospital day), 3.2 mg/dL (third hospital day), 2.9 mg/dL (sixth hospital day), 2.2 mg/dL (eighth hospital day)
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Creatinine levels decreased from 3.5 mg/dL at the second admission to 2.2 mg/dL by the eighth hospital day.
Decreased from 43.8% (4 months earlier) to 32.8% (on admission).
Decreased from 15.2 g/dL (4 months earlier) to 11.7 g/dL (on admission).
Increased to 200 mg/dL on the second hospital day, then decreased to 58 mg/dL by the sixth hospital day.
Decreased to 81 mg/dL by the sixth hospital day.
Decreased to 137 mmol/L by the eighth hospital day.
Increased to 4.0 mmol/L by the eighth hospital day.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Grew enteric gram-negative rods, proteus species, and probable enterococcus
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Cultures of blood and urine were sterile by the eighth hospital day after treatment.
